item.title: Lego is discontinuing its Mindstorms robotics kits by the end of the year
item.description: Lego is discontinuing its Mindstorms robotics kits by the end of the year Lego's Mindstorms robotics kits have been on the market since 1998, born from a collaboration between Lego and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT).

item.title: Minnesota and DC sue Target-owned Shipt delivery service for worker misclassification
item.description: Minnesota and DC sue Target-owned Shipt delivery service for worker misclassification The Minnesota and District of Columbia attorneys general are suing Target-owned Shipt delivery service over worker misclassification, CBS News has reported.

item.title: Sony's high-resolution A7R V mirrorless camera now shoots 8K video
item.description: Sony’s high-resolution A7R V mirrorless camera now shoots 8K video Sony has launched the $3,900 A7R V, its latest mirrorless camera designed to shoot portraits, landscapes and other subjects that require as much resolution as possible.

item.title: OM System unveils the OM-5, its first camera without the Olympus name
item.description: OM System unveils the OM-5, its first camera without the Olympus name OM System has launched its first camera that doesn't carry the Olympus name, the $1,200 OM-5 â€” and it looks a lot like the Olympus OM-D E-M5 Mark III, other than a few tweaks.

item.title: NASA names 16-person panel tasked with investigating UFOs
